J'ai été enthousiaste du principe du jeu et l'aspect casse tête, mais en 10 minutes, j'ai eu la nausée tellement c'est perturbant de se retrouver debout après être passé par un portail au sol. Je regrette de ne pas avoir physiquement pu aller plus loin sous peine de rendre mon repas. Attention donc à bien tester le jeu pour voir si vous supporter les effets. Je vais demander un remboursement à mon grand regret. Je conseille d'essayer, a minima :)

The beautifully innovative concept of portals coupled with engaging and challenging puzzles that feel extremely rewarding and satisfying to solve results in this masterpiece of a puzzle game that is Portal. The gameplay is interesting and fun throughout, and the plot behind the game is fascinating. You should definitely play this game.

I bought it during the summer discount and it's still not worth the money.

Para ser sinceros perdi la cuenta de cuantas veces me he pasado Portal y aproveche a este descuento que tenia para adquirirlo en steam y ¿saben? no me arrepiento y cada hora que paso haciendo de nuevo todos los puzzles y la batalla contra Glados es una explosion de sentimientos que no dejo de sentir y el sentimiento que se me viene al escuchar "Still Alive" fue algo que realmente no se por que pero me llego al corazon

Si quieren pasar un buen rato, disfrutar un poco la rompedera de coco y claro, completar los retos que te trae el juego, esta sera la mejor compra, no te cansaras y menos de ver los "secretos"
我发现自己晕传送门……很担忧未来的星际旅行怎么办，我觉得下回玩的时候应该先吃点晕车药试试，说不定管用呢~！

游戏确实不错，很有创造性的解谜游戏，就一把传送枪却能做很多事。
但是感觉难度有点低，第一次玩解谜游戏完全脱离攻略。最可怕的是这个游戏让我第一次亲身体验到了3d眩晕！以前一直以为这是装出来的矫情病，今天自己感受到了，差点吐出来。

The cake is a lie ;)

Portal is a very short game but was also very prolific when it came out. As part of the Orange Box, Portal was about two hours long but it made you think as you played. Puzzles ranged from simply getting a box from one place to another where others involved tricky jumps to avoid gunfire and crushing pistons. You had no weapons aside from your mind and the ability to place two different colored portals to deal with such challenges. Portal also offers separate challenges to complete if you feel the main game is not enough.

Pick this up with the Orange Box or as a stand alone. Either way, it's usually a bargain.

Just be ready to learn the origin of some of Valve's more well known, albeit slightly ancient memes.

Story mode is pretty short, I finished it under 3 hours.
There are just only 19 test chambers, and then boss fight.

Advanced tests are only 6, but they are so freaking hard @_@

Fun game, though I find it needs more test chambers in the story - 8/10

I played Portal 2 first. Spoiler Alert, there's portals. I love this game even though at the time of this review I haven't played much.

I think that Portal is pretty good game. Graphics are a little outdated but they still look good enough for me to not get visually bored. The chambers are uniqe and feel diffrent from one another. The music is the most lacking feature but it doesn't bother me too much since I'm too busy thinking, "How do I get the energy orb from one angle to another?". Some issues I do have is that it would be nice to have some hints on the later puzzles instead of looking them up on the Internet. Also the skill curve is very high. But overall I'd say that Portal is a classic that is totally worth buying.
After finishing the game, I have decided that it's amazingly fun. Although I do get dizzy a lot going through portals. Portal is a puzzle game, the best one I have played.

Preface:
The Orange Box was a bundle that contained Team Fortress 2, Half Life 2, and a small experimental game called Portal.
I was not around when the Orange Box launched in 2007. Portal was first introduced to me through a billboard promoting Portal 2. I would see this billboard four to five times a week. My curiosity was peaked... I searched up Portal on Google.  

Pros:
-The test chambers are smart and don't overstay their welcome.
-Atmosphere is still praised for its immersive ambiance.
-GLaDOS (voiced by Ellen Mclain) is hands down one of the best villains in the industry. 
-Few to none existent bugs/glitches.

Cons:
-Fairly short, at times it feels like a demo for Portal 2. However that should not deter away from to this masterpiece.

Verdict:
There should be no reason you don't have this game in your library. As simple as that sounds it's true.

5/5

Portal é o jogo da Valve, que tem fases para completar, e estratégias para portais, cada fase vc completa mais dificil fica, e complica e deixa com dor de cabeça pensando "o que é pra fazer?" vc deve ter habilidade e estratégia pra conseguir terminar o game. Portal é a mesma coisa que Portal 2 (Tbm irei analisar o Portal 2), mas muda os gráficos e fases, agora, veja as minhas opiniões abaixo 

Nota: 8/10
Jogabilidade: 7/10
Gráficos: 7,5/10

Juegazo

Portal was a great game, and still keeps its greatness, while being bit old. I run on a pretty slow laptop, and this game still ran fast, which made the gameplay smooth. The game isn't too hard, but it's not a cakewalk, because the cake is a lie. The game was mostly linear, but did require some searching around as well. Fun dominates frusturation while playing Portal, and some scenarios give you a frantic feeling, but it doesn't do that too often. Portal is cryptic, but not too cryptic to scare the pants off of players around the age of 13. I really recommend Portal, this game shouldn't take you too long to complete, and is a great game to experience.
Check out Portal 2 as well!

Ein einzigartiges Spielkonzept mit grandioser Umsetzung.

Toller Rätselspaß und nettes Gehirntraining. Ich möchte jetzt nicht allzu viel spoilern, aber man bekommt keinen Kuchen. :(
Sehr gut designte Szenerie mit vielen Orten zum Entdecken. Meiner Meinung nach ist dieses Spiel zurecht ein bewährter Klassiker, der in keiner Steam-Bibliothek fehlen sollte.

Die kniffligen Rätsel machen es zu einem anspruchsvollen Spiel, das Gehirnkapazitäten beansprucht und daher auch für alte Strategen Durchfall zu empfehlen ist.

MfG clumsy

[h1]Pontos Positivos[/h1]
Jogo de puzzle muito criativo e divertido. O mais impressionante é a robô narradora que é muito cínica e que com certeza traz boas risadas. Para quem gosta de histórias este jogo também tem um história bem legal, principalmente quem for jogar as continuações.

[h1]Pontos Negativos[/h1]
A personagem a qual você controla poderia ter um gráfico melhor. Sei que o jogo tem uma certa idade, mas nas continuações, mesmo os gráficos do jogo tendo melhorado, ela não foi muito melhorada.
Gioco da avere assolutamente nella vostra libreria,l'unica pecca è la durata davvero corta della storia.

Рекомендую для развития пространственного мышления.
Дерзайте.
